title: Apple releases first macOS 12.5 and macOS 11.6.7 betas ahead of WWDC
content:
Following the public release of macOS 12.4 with support for the first Studio Display webcam fix and over 50 security updates, Apple has released the first macOS 12.5 beta with WWDC just a few weeks away.

more…

The post Apple releases first macOS 12.5 and macOS 11.6.7 betas ahead of WWDC appeared first on 9to5Mac.
description: Following the public release of macOS 12.4 with support for the first Studio Display webcam fix and over 50 security updates, Apple has released the first macOS 12.5 beta with WWDC just a few weeks away. macOS 12.5 beta 1 is now available via OTA for developers already enrolled in the beta as well as […]
